metadata.description: Known as the skilled co-pilot of the infamous Millennium Falcon, the legendary Wookiee warrior Chewbacca stars in his very own series! After the battle of Yavin, Chewbacca is on his own when he crash lands his ship on an Imperial occupied planet. Now stranded, Chewie finds himself caught in the middle of trying to return to the rebellion and helping a young and feisty girl in need.
metadata.name: Chewbacca
